vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
vulnerabilities.description: Forces browsers to use HTTPS connections only. Recommended: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Content Security Policy (CSP)
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents XSS, clickjacking, and code injection attacks. Recommended: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; object-src 'none'

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - X-Frame-Options
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents clickjacking attacks by controlling iframe embedding. Recommended: DENY or SAMEORIGIN

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - X-XSS-Protection (Legacy)
vulnerabilities.description: Enables browser XSS filters (deprecated, use CSP instead). Recommended: 1; mode=block

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Referrer Policy
vulnerabilities.description: Controls how much referrer information is shared. Recommended: no-referrer or strict-origin-when-cross-origin

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Permissions Policy (formerly Feature-Policy)
vulnerabilities.description: Controls which browser features can be used. Recommended: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=()

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies
vulnerabilities.description: Controls cross-domain policies for Adobe Flash and PDF. Recommended: none

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy (COEP)
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents loading cross-origin resources without explicit permission. Recommended: require-corp

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy (COOP)
vulnerabilities.description: Isolates browsing context from cross-origin windows. Recommended: same-origin

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy (CORP)
vulnerabilities.description: Prevents other domains from reading responses. Recommended: same-origin

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Security Header - Expect-CT (Deprecated)
vulnerabilities.description: Certificate Transparency enforcement (deprecated). Recommended: max-age=86400, enforce
